Package picard.vcf.filter

Interface Summary
GenotypeFilter An interface for classes that perform Genotype filtration.
VariantFilter Interface for classes that can generate filters for VariantContexts.
 

Class Summary
AlleleBalanceFilter Filters out a record if the allele balance for heterozygotes is out of a defined range across all samples.
DepthFilter Filters out a record if all variant samples have depth lower than the given value.
FilterApplyingVariantIterator Iterator that dynamically applies filter strings to VariantContext records supplied by an underlying iterator.
FilterVcf Applies a set of hard filters to Variants and to Genotypes within a VCF.
FisherStrandFilter Filters records based on the phred scaled p-value from the Fisher Strand test stored in the FS attribute.
GenotypeQualityFilter Genotype filter that filters out genotypes below a given quality threshold.
QdFilter Filters out sites that have a QD annotation applied to them and where the QD value is lower than a lower limit.
